extends java.lang.Object

      • Information

        public Information(Tile[][] gameState,
                   int score,
                   int time,
                   int numOfMoves,
                   java.util.TreeSet<java.lang.Integer> milestonesReached,
                   int bestScore,
                   int totalScore,
                   int topTile,
                   java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,Information.MilestoneTile> milestones)
        Create Information object with existing information
        Parameters:
        gameState - Current game state
        score - Current score
        time - Current time played
        numOfMoves - Current number of moves
        milestonesReached - Milestones reached
        bestScore - All time best score
        totalScore - Total score of all games
        topTile - Top tile reached
        milestones - Milestones information
